<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/3d2a47c7823b934e1a85d773b68758c87c3ddc90|patch 8.1.2268: spell file flag zero is not recognized>
patch 8.1.2268: spell file flag zero is not recognized

Problem:    Spell file flag zero is not recognized.
Solution:   Use -1 as an error value, so that zero can be used as a valid flag
            number.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2268: spell file flag zero is not recognized 路 vim/vim@3d2a47c
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2268: spell file flag zero is not recognized 路 vim/vim@3d2a47c
attachments.text: Problem: Spell file flag zero is not recognized. Solution: Use -1 as an error value, so that zero can be used as a valid flag number.

patch 8.1.2269: tags file with very long line stops using binary search

Problem:    Tags file with very long line stops using binary search.
Solution:   Reallocate the buffer if needed.
